notesStmt.note: Damage at edges: tidemark at foot, top edge dark, with lots of tears. Splits along column folds. Shedding fragments. Oversewn, and sewing split in several areas. Slight worming. Some salt accretions. Mould mottling on verso.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.
